summary: This document appears to be an FBI 302 form summarizing an interview or preparation session with a witness (referred to as 'U') regarding Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. The witness was shown a photobook and asked to identify individuals, and provided details about massages, payments, and interactions with Epstein and Maxwell.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified by the witness in a photobook (photo #7). The witness describes giving him massages 2-5 times per week at his home.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Identified by the witness in a photobook (photos #8 and #16, with #16 confirmed). The witness states Maxwell called to schedule massage appointments and commented on the witness's appearance.

connections.description: Maxwell is described as scheduling massage appointments for the witness to give to Epstein.
The witness (U) provided massages to Epstein at his home, starting 2-3 times per week and increasing to 3-5 times per week.
Maxwell commented that U was very pretty when they first met, and Maxwell scheduled U's massage appointments with Epstein.

events.title: Witness Interview / Preparation
events.description: A witness (U) is interviewed or prepared for trial testimony. She is shown a photobook containing 20 photographs and asked to identify individuals, including Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: First Massage at Epstein's Home
events.description: The witness (U) recalls her first massage at Jeffrey Epstein's home, where she was topless in her underwear, Epstein walked in and kissed her, and she was paid in $100 bills.

keyFacts: A witness (U) identified Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell in a photobook shown to her by investigators.
The witness described giving massages to Jeffrey Epstein 2-5 times per week at his home, with the frequency increasing over time.
Ghislaine Maxwell called to schedule the witness's massage appointments with Epstein for the first couple of months.
During the first massage at Epstein's home, the witness was topless in her underwear, Epstein walked in and kissed her, and she was paid in $100 bills.
The witness told her mother that calls from Epstein's employees were about 'house cleaning' to conceal the nature of the activities.
